entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers near noon. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections near noon. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 10 January 2023
